member.name: T:x_IMU_API.PacketEncoding
member.summary: Packet encoding class. Contains static methods for packet encoding and decoding.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.PacketEncoding.EncodePacket(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes packet with consecutive right shifts so that the msb of each encoded byte is clear. The msb of the final byte is set to indicate the end of the packet.
member.param: The decoded packet contents to be encoded.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.PacketEncoding.RightShiftByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Right shifts a byte array by 1 bit. The lsb of byte x becomes the msb of byte x+1.
member.param: The byte array to be right shifted.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.PacketEncoding.DecodePacket(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes a packet with consecutive left shifts so that the msb of each encoded byte is removed.
member.param: The endcoded packet to be decoded.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.PacketEncoding.LeftShiftByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Left shifts a byte array by 1 bit. The msb of byte x becomes the lsb of byte x-1.
member.param: The byte array to be left shifted.

Minutes. Must be of value 0 to 59.
Seconds. Must be of value 0 to 59.

member.name: T:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData
member.summary: Quaternion data class.
member.remarks: See http://www.x-io.co.uk/res/doc/quaternions.pdf for more information on quaternions.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.#ctor(System.Single[])
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: Quaternion. Must of 4 elements. Each element must be of value -1 to +1.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.Rad2Deg(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts from radians to degrees.
member.param: Angular quantity in radians.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToConjugate
member.summary: Returns the quaternion conjugate.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToRotationMatrix
member.summary: Converts data to rotation matrix.
member.remarks: The 1st to 3rd elements represent columns 1 to 3 of row 1. The 4th to 5th elements represent columns 1 to 3 of row 2. The 6th to 8th elements represent columns 1 to 3 of row 3.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToEulerAngles
member.summary: Converts data to XYZ Euler angles (in degrees).

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToRotationMatrixCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables representaing the elements of a rotation matrix.
member.remarks: The 1st to 3rd values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 1. The 4th to 5th values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 2. The 6th to 8th values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 3.

member.name: M:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToEulerAnglesCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables representaing the XYZ Euler angles (in degrees).

member.name: P:x_IMU_API.QuaternionData.Quaternion
member.summary: Gets or sets the quaternion. Must of 4 elements. Vector will be normalised.

Value that controls whether the scan will continue indefinitely until at least one x-IMU has been found.

member.summary: Requests cancelation of pending background port scan process.

member.summary: BackgroundWorker DoWork event to run DoScan as new process.

member.summary: Scans ports for x-IMUs.
member.param: Enables OnAsyncScanProgressChanged event for use when called within background worker.

member.name: P:x_IMU_API.PortScanner.DontGiveUp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the scan will continue indefinitely until at least one x-IMU has been found.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the application has requested cancelation of asynchronous port scan process.
